author: ptcox
body: Moved DQMOffline/Muon/CSCOfflineMonitor hist booking from beginJob to beginRun as per DQM recommendations. I tested afterwards with whiterabbit.py which ran apparently without problems. I cannot be sure that whiterabbit tests these specific changes of course but I presume a DQM expert can.
title: Consumes to CSCOffline monitor -  fix 1
